highlights.title: Cortisol's Role in Fasting
highlights.description: Explains how cortisol maintains glucose during fasting.

highlights.title: Cortisol Mechanism Explained
highlights.description: Details the steroid hormone mechanism of cortisol.

highlights.title: Comparison with Other Hormones
highlights.description: Contrasts cortisol's mechanism with glucagon and epinephrine.

highlights.title: Cortisol and Gene Transcription
highlights.description: Highlights the importance of cortisol in gene transcription.

highlights.title: Conclusion and Call to Action
highlights.description: Encourages viewers to like and subscribe for more content.
